name: Midnight Ramen
description:
Midnight Ramen is a short game made for a school project. It's a game where you take over your dear friend's ramen shop and get to know the regular customers by making them ramen. 

CREDITS

Programming Maddie Space

Artist/Animator Ryan Thanh-Long Vo 

Designer Raphaël Thériault 

Level Designer (Dialogue) Franck Yann Mongo

Designer (interface) Pascal Dubois 

Sound design/Voices Sébastien Vaillancourt
